title: [Atoll, Obsidian Pathway]
description: A collection of seaweed stretches down the almost aimless obsidian path, the water inside the atoll swirling to and fro with a mind of its own.  A humming noise of inexplicable origin can be heard in the distance, its volume rising and falling in counterpoint to the ocean's waves.

A collection of seaweed stretches down the almost aimless obsidian path, the water inside the atoll twisting to and fro with a mind of its own.  A humming noise can be heard in the distance, its origin unknown.
